qwen2.5:1.5b.cot:
Sure, here is my response:

dear [friend],

i hope this message finds you well. i am writing to you not because there's anything urgent that needs discussing or a matter of importance that requires your attention, but rather because i simply thought it would be nice if we could join forces and go vote together.

voting has always been such an exciting activity for us, especially in the lead-up to elections when everything seems to have meaning and significance. let's make it even more meaningful by not just voting, but doing it as a team with each of our friends. i believe that choosing who will represent us at this crucial time is one of the most vital decisions we can take.

i know you love politics and that you're passionate about your country's future, so let's join forces for something positive instead of just any old vote. maybe it could be to support a candidate or issue that means more to you than any other in this election cycle. let's make history today by taking an active part in shaping the future.

i look forward to hearing from you soon with your thoughts on whether we should take up this challenge and go vote together or if we have something else on our minds.

best regards,
[me]
qwen2.5:1.5b.few_shot:
Dear [Friend's Name],

I hope this message finds you well. I wanted to ask if you could come vote for me in the upcoming election.

Thank you so much!

Best regards,
[Your Name]
qwen2.5:1.5b.zero_shot:
my dear friend,

i hope this letter finds you well. i wanted to take a moment to remind you that the upcoming election is coming up, and it's important to exercise your right as a citizen by casting your ballot.

please consider voting for someone whom you trust will represent your values and priorities effectively in making decisions on behalf of the community. whether that be local or national level, every vote counts.

let's do our part in creating change for what we believe is best, so please go out there and make your voice heard by taking action to cast your ballot. good luck and may you find the courage to take this important step.

best regards,
[Your Name]

qwen3:14b.few_shot:
hi [friend's name],  
i hope you're doing well. i wanted to ask you something important. there's an election coming up and i really think your voice matters. voting is a way to make sure our community gets the representation it needs. would you be able to go and vote? i know it's a small thing, but it can make a big difference. if you need help finding the polling place or want someone to go with you, just let me know. i'd be happy to help.  
thank you for considering this. your vote counts, and i believe in the power of what we can achieve together.  
with lots of support,  
[your name]
qwen3:14b.zero_shot:
hey [friend's name],  

i hope you're doing well. i've been thinking about the upcoming election and wanted to remind you how important it is to vote. your voice counts, and every vote makes a difference. whether it's about the issues that matter to you or the future of our community, showing up at the polls is one of the easiest ways to make change.  

i know life can get busy, but taking that hour to vote is a small step that can lead to big impacts. don't forget to check your registration status and bring your ID if needed.  

let's make sure our voices are heardâ€”see you at the polls!  

with lots of support,

task_description: Write a letter to a friend in all lowercase letters ask them to go and vote.
